turns.text: An elderly man or woman who is too poor to afford food.  At one point in their life, they had so much to look forward to.  But now they've found themselves at the end and they are so powerless that they cannot even feed themselves.  I cannot fathom that level of sadness to sit there at the end of a very long life and to wonder how you got there...
